Package Controller

Class CabsCentralController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.CabsCentralController
  • public class CabsCentralController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the central cabs controller where centralizes cabs central model and view.

        public void showTaxiTripStatusMessage​(Cab cab)
        This method prints if the Taxi Trip was given successfully or if it was not possible to do that.
        Parameters:
        cab - receives an object cab if the process was successful and null if not.
